

CREATE TABLE `pic` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `url` char(255) NOT NULL,
  `pars` int(1) NOT NULL,
  `pic` mediumblob,
  PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;



CREATE TABLE `text` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `url` char(255) NOT NULL,
  `title` text NOT NULL,
  `pars` int(1) NOT NULL,
  `text` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
        
CREATE TABLE `sin` (
  `word` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `sinonim` varchar(20) NOT NULL
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251;
